channel.title: Arrows showing in the air while ranging + Magic Gfxs not correct
channel.description: My server is deltascape, so the mage spells like tange and Tb and all that, show some Red bubbles lol instead of the actually gfx. the same with my ranging it doesnt show it in the air before hitting something, how can i change all this?

item.title: Arrows showing in the air while ranging + Magic Gfxs not correct
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

IfearI answered.
I answered.

No need for you to post, especially when you’re just talking out of your ass

Read full topic
item.source: Arrows showing in the air while ranging + Magic Gfxs not correct

item.title: Arrows showing in the air while ranging + Magic Gfxs not correct
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Who said its been answered?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 09 August 2009, 10:02:18[/size][hr][quote=“raped by who, post:7, topic:293898”]obviously the GFX isn’t loading when an attack is initiated
if he just makes the GFX load with range attacks, and edit the magicSpells.cfg, and his magic packet, it will work.[/quote]
Thats why I was asking for his void… so he would know where to add the GFX

l2read the thread before posting.

Read full topic
item.source: Arrows showing in the air while ranging + Magic Gfxs not correct

item.title: Arrows showing in the air while ranging + Magic Gfxs not correct
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

…

The question has been answered.

How wouldn’t it be a problem with the GFX?

obviously the GFX isn’t loading when an attack is initiated
if he just makes the GFX load with range attacks, and edit the magicSpells.cfg, and his magic packet, it will work.

l2read the thread before posting.

Read full topic

[quote=“IfearI, post:4, topic:293898”][quote author=p00n99range link=topic=388826.msg2906369#msg2906369 date=1249832789]
Wrong section, Please post in the client help.
[/quote]

I do not think so, its not a problem with a GFX, it’s a problem which GFX he uses.[/quote]

He’s trying to spam his post count up.

@ontopic
like fear said, you’re going to want to go to your pvp / pvnpc packets, and just add in the GFX for all the shit

Magic spells on delta have the GFX loaded from magicSpells.cfg or something (or atleast they do on my packaged one <.<
